document.heading: Public Charter School Assets and Facilities Preservation Amendment Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-268, the “Public Charter School Assets and Facilities Preservation Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-624, which was referred to Committee on Education, Libraries and Recreation. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 6, 2006, and December 19, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-624 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-268 became effective on March 14, 2007.
